title: Sony Xperia XA Review
description:
Share you thoughts and opinions by commenting below.

Subscribe to our channel for more tech: http://bit.ly/1HEA3NZ

A solid mid range handset with very thin bezels, the Xperia XA looks the part and has a solid specification.

However at the price point it is sold at there is a lot of competition, so does it really have what it takes to stand out in the crowd of similar phones?

For more information on the particular product(s) shown please visit :https://www.clove.co.uk/sony-xperia-xa 

If you liked this video then please hit the 'like' button, it helps us a lot!

Got something to say about the video, then leave a comment (we try to read them all) and we will of course reply where necessary.

If you want to see more of our videos then make sure you hit the 'Subscribe' button as this way you will get to see them first.

Why not check out some of our other videos, there are a lot on our channel. You can search if you are looking for something specific or you can check out one of our playlists below:

Popular uploads, as decided by our viewers: http://tinyurl.com/clovepopular

Quick access to all our playlists: http://tinyurl.com/cloveplaylists

Device unboxings: http://tinyurl.com/cloveunboxings

Comparisons:http://tinyurl.com/clovecomparisons

Accessories: http://tinyurl.com/cloveaccessories

Reviews: http://tinyurl.com/clovereviews

Vlogs: http://tinyurl.com/clovevlogs

Device language videos: http://tinyurl.com/clovelanguages

Device video samples: http://tinyurl.com/clovevideosample

Any other demo video we have that does not fit in the above categories: http://tinyurl.com/clovedemos

Who are Clove Technology?
Clove Technology is a UK based mobile technology specialist, specifically smartphones, tablets and accessories. Established in 1992, we have handled the majority of mobile technology and bring you up close and personal with the latest smartphones, tablets and accessories, right here on this YouTube channel.

As an independent company we give honest, yet informed opinions on all the products we cover. 

If you like what you see then be sure to check out our other videos and if you really want one of the products from the videos, then visit www.clove.co.uk to make your purchase. 

With global shipping options you need not worry about not being able to buy or having to wait a long time to receive it!

If you also want a different view on the mobile industry, then be sure to check out our blog for the latest news and information.  Just head to blog.clove.co.uk

Please check out links to our other communities. We like to connect with.  You can find great discussions on our twitter & Google Plus pages.
